dcterms:description: A dataset containing RDI sequences captured from 21 people with different genders, ages, and weights, totaling more than 20,000 sequences, each approximately 60 seconds long. The dataset is used for gesture recognition and includes challenges such as random frame dropping.
dcterms:title: RDI sequence dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset focused on pure motions, specifically associated with repeated hand or finger actions without noise and body interference. It is used for noise-based segmentation in gesture recognition.
dcterms:title: Pure motions dataset

dcterms:description: A large multi-person dataset used for evaluating the architecture of gesture recognition models, reporting high accuracy rates.
dcterms:title: Multi-person dataset
